summary: This document is an email chain from July 2020 regarding preparations for a video interview of a victim (referred to as 'her' or 'she') with the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). The primary email includes a list of persons the victim interacted with in connection with Jeffrey Epstein, detailing specific abuse allegations and logistical contacts.

persons.name: Alex
persons.context: Addressed in the email, appears to be a prosecutor or investigator from the US Attorney's Office preparing for a video interview with a victim.

persons.name: Figuroa
persons.context: Knew the victim and drove her to Epstein's house; described by the email author as 'less than fully cooperative and less than completely reliable'.

persons.name: Chislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Met the victim about 10 times at Epstein's; the victim saw nude photos of her, was taken to Epstein's by her once, and Maxwell acted like a secretary making appointments.

persons.name: Igor
persons.context: Saw him at Epstein's house; role unspecified.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The victim saw him over 100 times; alleges he fondled her, masturbated every time, was naked, and slapped her butt several times. Also had intercourse with her once.

connections.description: Maxwell met the victim at Epstein's location, took her there, and made appointments for Epstein, acting like a secretary.
Figuroa drove the victim to Epstein's house and knew her; described as an ex-boyfriend who drove her over once or twice in the beginning.
The victim alleges extensive sexual abuse by Epstein over more than 100 encounters, including fondling, masturbation, and intercourse.
Maxwell interacted with the victim approximately 10 times at Epstein's, arranged appointments, and was present during visits.

events.title: Scheduled victim interview
events.description: A video interview is scheduled for the victim with the US Attorney's Office (USANYS) via WebEx.

events.title: Victim's abuse by Epstein
events.description: The victim describes over 100 encounters with Epstein where he fondled her, masturbated, was naked, and slapped her. Includes one instance of intercourse.

events.title: Incident with older man
events.description: An older man came to Epstein's house, masturbated in front of the victim, and touched her breasts while she was naked.

events.title: Staff quitting
events.description: One of two housekeeping couples quit because they did not want to be at Epstein's residence.

locations: Epstein's Palm dealin s withili esidence (likely Palm Beach residence)
Conference room in email author's office
keyFacts: A victim alleges she was sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein over 100 times, including fondling, masturbation, and at least one instance of intercourse.
Ghislaine Maxwell is implicated as an associate who met the victim at Epstein's, made appointments, and was present during visits.
The document is part of 2020 preparations for a victim interview by the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
Other individuals mentioned include a driver (Figuroa), an associate (Igor), male drivers from Epstein, housekeeping couples, and cooks.
The victim describes additional abuse by an unidentified older man at Epstein's house who masturbated in front of her and touched her breasts.
